name: Alien Nation - No Phun Intended (Deluxe Edition)
description:
"No Phun Intended" can be described as a blistering 9 track thrill ride of crunchy-nut cornflake distortion, whirlwind rattlesnake guitar/bass rhythms and gigantic percussive power.  This is Alien Nation's first attempt at LP length recordings, and tracks such as "Passive Aktivists" and "Pipebomb" document the raw edge and explosive drumming that has come to be expected of AN, whereas "Madman's Lullaby" and "Frozen Core" show their appreciation of tender melodics sugar coated in razor sharp distortion and clever mockery of popular music.  Now, remastered, and completely re-vocalled (the boys never liked the original cut!) in its new Deluxe package, "No Phun Intended" has come a long way.


1.  Time8Time
2.  Passive Aktivists
3.  Morning Conflict
4.  Jawa Power
5.  Frozen Core
6.  Madman's Lullaby
7.  Pipebomb
8.  Super Turbine
9.  Star Machine > T-Rex Stomp

name: Alien Nation - Hypernova EP
description:
Alien Nation's tighter, faster, louder and more in-yer-face than ever mini-album, Hypernova.  This 5 track concept EP, with songs like "Pterodactyl" and the time-warping "Hyper-Reality", will have you wondering how they got from A to B.  A taste of things to come.

1.  Police In The Sky
2.  Snakethrower
3.  Hyper-Reality
4.  Pterodactyl
5.  Violent Space

name: Alien Nation T-shirt
description: The first of many new and classic Alien Nation t-shirt designs.
